scenario_text.value:
Oh, hey, Takuma. You came at a good time.
Would you have a moment to talk?
Talk? Sure, what about?

I didn’t get a chance to thank you properly
before, so let me say it now.

Takuma... Thank you so much for coming back
to this world.

Whoa, where’d that come from? That’s nothing
worth thanking me for.

That’s not true at all. I mean, you could
have abandoned us, but you came back.

You came from our world back to this scary
place... I’m impressed by your courage.

Oh, um... Well... Sorry, it’s kind of awkward
to hear you say that.

Now that you’ve come back, Takuma, what does
this world look like to you?

In the few days that passed for you, the
situation took such a turn for the worse.
Yeah, I can see that...all too well.

There are so many mysteries, and enemies keep
attacking. We try to survive, but it’s tough.

That’s why I want to support everyone as much
as I can.
You mean, like...as a leader?

Haha, no, not that... Aoi’s got that covered.
Way better than I ever could.

I mean more like...someone to talk to in hard
times; someone they can rely on.
Hmm... You mean like the professor?

Yes, exactly! He’s a perfect example of the
role I’m aiming for!

...I’ve stopped pushing myself out of fear of
my dad’s shadow, but I still want to help.

I want to keep a cool head at all times. Even
someone like me can handle that at my age.

Ah, whoops, I promised to knock it off with
that “someone like me” talk.

Shuuji, I’m so sorry... I think you’re pretty
reliable the way you are now.

Ha ha, hey, you don’t have to say that!
I know more than anyone how immature I am.

I still have to work hard. For everyone. For
Lopmon...
And most importantly, for me.

(Shuuji’s being optimistic, but he seems kind
of worked up? I’m a little worried...)

At any rate, Takuma... As a calmer, older
kid, I have something to say to you.
Oh, sure. What is it?

There’ve been lots of Kenzoku attacks in this
area lately. It’s dangerous to be here alone.

(Oh, I get it. So that’s what he wanted to
talk about...)

Got it, Takuma? Don’t go wandering around on
your own!
Yes, got it! I’ll be careful.
